VICTORY: ¡SANDY!

Kick the ball into your opponent\'s goal. Everything\'s allowed! This mode is for 2 players at the same computer.

est eliminé !

Travelling to Hammerfest...
You\'ve just arrived!
Click here to start...
Starting game...
Saving game...

You\'ll have a game less.
This mode is free and unlimited!
----[ MODE DEV LOCAL ]----
Error sending data, try attempt:
Loading music...
Everything\'s ready!

Couldn\'t find file server.
Download error
Error at the beginning of the download
Music download error!
Game download error! Check the Technical Support to Clear your browser\'s cache memory.
Saving game...
Impossible to finish saving the game.
Game successfully saved :)
Jump *into the well* to start the adventure!
A secret passageway!
At the very bottom of the well, a frightening laugh resounds...
You have discovered a *secret passageway*!
You have just freed the latest fruits!
You hear a clicking sound coming from a pack of *Bombinos*...
The Bombinos have been destroyed! Igor can continue his adventure.
A strange noise is coming from the lower levels...
You have just entered the *Baddybombs Pears\' Lair*...
Igor has beaten the Baddybombs Pears!
It seems that temperature has suddenly dropped... Igor has arrived at the *Sorbex* Dive!
The terrible Sortex lemons have been destroyed! Igor can continue his exploration...
Igor has just arrived at a Tagada-Strawberry-Ball match. You\'ll need to beat the team of *Tagada-Strawberries* !
The *Strawberry* team has been beaten 4-0 by Igor the champion!
Igor has entered the cavern of the mischievous *Kiwi Sappers*!
You have beaten the *Kiwi Sappers*!
The *Destiny Test*
You have entered a secret and forgotten place... The *Test Temple*!
The *Dexterity* Test
You have *failed* to pass this Test
You have *won* this horrible Test!
The *Courage* Test
You have opened a *shortcut*!
The whistling sound of bodies moving through the air... no doubt! You are in the territory of the *Leapers*!
Silence comes again whilst the last Leaper falls down...
BETA-TEST: cette porte mène au niveau 51.
*Darkness* invades the caverns while you go down...
The ground is shaking... Prepare yourself to face the *Armaggedon-Pineapple*!
Calm returns whilst the latest Armaggedon-Pineapple falls down...
Choose the court for this match. You can *press the P key* to obtain help at any moment.
This *special court* is dedicated to VolleyFest!
You have found the *Ankhel Jewel*! Rick would be proud of you...
The *Ankhel Jewel* has been sealed for eternity. All that effort for nothing!
Protect the *red button*!
Pick up the maximum number of crystals you can!
The door has just opened!
A suspicious mouldy smell is coming from the lower levels...
Something horrible seems to have germinated from the Bobble Cane... You are in the Fallen Bobbles Den!
The Fallen Bobbles have been beaten... Considering the size of the Cane, it\'s possible that there are more sticks all over the caverns.
*SPFiredrake* : Welcome to the Carrotian Council, Igor. We\'ve been waiting for you.
*Joekickass* : We are reflections of yourself. We each come from a parallel dimension where we have succeeded in defeating Tuberculoz.
*Lucied* : A superior entity sent us here to help you in your quest and show you the way.
*DigDog* : Who\'s next? Is it my turn?
*goronhead* : Here is the Gordon Key. It will allow you to open the entrance to our cavern.
*arr8* : We have hidden, at the bottom of this cavern, the great Bobble Cane -an object of legend and of great value.
*goronhead* : But we did that a very long time ago... before The Great Update.
*Everyone* : Oooooooooh... The Great Update!
*SPFiredrake* : SILENCE!
*SPFiredrake* : As First Pantheonian, I entrust to you the important task of retrieving the Bobble Cane. Now, go.
*SPFiredrake* : The Bobble Cane has been **corrupted**!
*Everyone* : ooooooooh....
*DigDog* : Corrupted! Your turn...
*goronhead* : I bet you comrades that this corruption will be the source of huge changes!
*Lucied* : You must return to explore the caverns, Igor. Without a doubt, other *secret places* just like this one exist...
*SPFiredrake* : Yes, it\'s true! You must be attentive, Igor. Search every corner of this world...
*SPFiredrake* : We had never mentioned it... but numerous secrets still hide in The Caverns of Hammerfest!!
*arr8* : ... Like the one where you blow of a bomb in the Well?
*Everyone* : ooooooooooooooooh....
Use the *arrow keys* to move Igor from right to left.
Press the *Up arrow key* to jump up this wall!
Throw yourself into the void to go to the next level.
Use the *space bar* on the keyboard to place a bomb next to Igor. These bombs *freeze the enemy*, but they don\'t have *any effect on you*.
A defeated enemy gives you an *item*. Don\'t be long in recovering it because it won\'t last eternally!
Sometimes you must freeze the enemy *a few times* by pushing it into the void. Place another bomb beside the frozen monster to push it more.
Don\'t forget to collect the item before leaving the level.
You can *push the bombs*! Press the Space bar key again beside a bomb.
Put a bomb here and *press the Space bar key again*!
Good! Do the same for the next one!
This technique is very important! Learn well how to use it.
There are different types of bombs. Pass through the *energy field* to change the type of bomb.
*Green bombs* explode when they come in contact with an enemy, like *mines*!
Place a *green mine* here!
Pay attention: if you kick a green mine, it explodes *when it touches the ground*!
You can change the type of bomb again when you pass through other energy fields.
You\'ll see that *Igor\'s scarf changes its color* depending on the bomb type
*Blue bombs* knock out an enemy and they make it *fall from a platform*.
Pay attention because blue bombs explode more quickly.
Some items have surprising effects that will help you on your adventure!
Some of them will have positive effects, others won\'t. It\'s up to you to discover them!
Accumulate the letters from the word *CRISTAL* that will appear throughout your adventure.
All the enemies will be destroyed and you\'ll be able to go directly to the next level!
Use *red* bombs to propel yourself onto the highest platforms. *Place a red bomb here and don\'t move*!
Oh well, what are you doing here?
No! Don\'t go that way!!
Well that\'s enough...
You can jump higher *dropping bombs during the jump*. If you do this at the precise moment, this will give you a little push.
Well done!
You can *jump farther* thanks to this techique. Drop a bomb during the jump.
Drop the bomb right at the moment *when you start to go down* during the jump.
Let\'s see if you reach the exit at this level!
The Learning mode has finished! Let\'s start in earnest...
*Secret*: there\'s a secret door in the *first level* of this Learning level. Place *a bomb just on the right, in the first level*!
You can jump through the ceiling *to go up a platform*.
To jump over this hole, press the *up arrow key* and then *leave the left arrow key* pressed.
Nearly! *Go back to the right* and try again.
There\'s an *enemy* here!
You can only leave a level if all the enemies have been defeated.
Don\'t worry if you die. Unlike the other game modes in Hammerfest, in the Learning mode you have *unlimited lives*!
Good! Go down again *on the right*...
If you can\'t do it, you can continue through the passage on the left. *Jump at the right moment when the red bomb explodes*!
No, not here :) In the *first level of this Learning*! For the moment you can simply continue.
This door is a Learning shortcut. To continue, follow the arrow!
Don\'t go any farther! It\'s the end of the world!
This bucket won\'t fall.
You won\'t be able to go further!
*Red bombs* can also help an ennemy to escape from a blocked place.
Here you have a sample of what you\'ll find in the Caverns of Hammerfest... *Jump into the void to continue!*
This is it! You\'re ready to start the great adventure!
If you haven\'t done it yet, you only have to *create an account* and guide Igor to the very far end of the caverns...
Hammerfest: more than *100 levels* to explore, more than *150 items* to collect and *15 different types of enemies*.
At the bottom of the game screen you see the *number of lives left*, the *number of the level* and *your score*.
Once you have created an account, you\'ll be able to win extra lives during the game or thanks to the *quests*
A quest consists of collecting a certain number of items spread all over the game.
Each time you play a game your score is registered and you enter into the *general ranking*!
Go on, don\'t be shy and join the other players!
Utilisez la *barre espace* pour poser une bombe près du fruit. Ces bombes *gèlent les ennemis*, mais n\'ont *aucun effet sur vous*.
Faites attention aux *pièges* !!
Bravo ! Vous avez réussi à terminer cette série de niveaux ! Hammerfest vous attend, avec ses *centaines de niveaux uniques* et ses *milliers de surprises* !
Essayez donc d\'attraper ce *joyau*... Attention, les *scies ne peuvent pas être détruites* !
You can drop a bomb while you are falling to take advantage of a slight extra impulse.
Press the M key to stop the game music.
A frozen monster can kill others if it strikes them at high speed!
If you kill several monsters with one single bomb, you will receive better rewards.
If you reach 100.000 points, you will gain an additional life.
Some letters of the word CRYSTAL are more rare than others (\' L \' or \' S \' for example)
In every level you will receive a point item, an effect item and some letters for the word CRYSTAL.
The giant crystal at the end of some levels does not fall incidentally...
Forming the word CRYSTAL is useful, but it\'s possible to make it even better...
After dropping a bomb, press SPACE again to kick it!
Press CONTROL + SHIFT + K to end the game (your progress will be saved).
Press the F key to show the speed of the game (shown in frames per second, the ideal value is 30 or higher).
Press C to show the map of the caverns!

quests.quest: \t\t\tFrom now on and forever, Igor can place 2 bombs!
\t\t\tIgor knows how to place his bombs vertically now and he can place them\n\t\t\ton the upper platform! Press DOWN arrow key beside a placed bomb.
\t\t\tFrom now on Igor will always start the game with an extra life.
\t\t\tIgor will start from now on the game with another extra life.
\t\t\tIgor will start the game with another life!
\t\t\tIgor will start the game with an extra life.
\t\t\tNew food, healthier and nicer, will appear now in the game.
\t\t\tIgor wants more sweet things! From now on sweets will appear in the game.
\t\t\tIgor's taste for badly-balanced food will lead him to find even more food of questionable quality.
\t\t\tIgor's weird diet brings exotic new food to the game!
\t\t\tA lot of items of weird effects appear now in the game to help you in\n\t\t\tthe adventure!
\t\t\tIgor has discovered a rare text. It's a kind of cookbook about hallucinogenic\n\t\t\tmushrooms. Igor will be able to find them now.
\t\t\tGreat new richness will appear now in the game!
\t\t\tThis mysterious in-depth book talks about the 12 Zodiac Constellations.\n\t\t\tThey are now available in the game!
\t\t\tItems with devastating powers will appear now in the game!
\t\t\tAfter eating every kind of food, no matter what, Igor has become a Master of\n\t\t\tthe games! Now he will be able to collect rare items and exceptional food\n\t\t\tduring his adventure!
\t\t\tIgor appreciates basic food. He could be offered a nice career in videogames!\n\t\t\tAdapted food will be available in the game, and also a deck of cards!

quest.title: Life is like a box of chocolates...

quests.quest: \t\t\tDelicious chocolates will be now available in Hammerfest!
\t\t\tAfter collecting so many diamonds of mysterious origin, Igor adquires the\n\t\t\tability of finding precious stones! He'll be able now to find them throughout\n\t\t\this quests.
\t\t\tKeeping far from good food, Igor discovers now that he can also eat\n\t\t\tcanned food!
\t\t\tIgor has become an expert in precious stones. Now his knowledge permits him to\n\t\t\tdiscover precious stones which are even more powerful!
\t\t\tIgor is fed up hunting sweets! As he has turned into an unconditional predator,\n\t\t\tnow he will be able to devour any sort of delicacy.

\t\t\tThey say that Igor is the reencarnation of Saladou, the world famous master\n\t\t\tof salads for virtual rabbits. With this new talent, he will be able to collect\n\t\t\ta great variety of vegetables!
\t\t\tAfter a complete lunch, Igor will now have access to really delicious cakes.
\t\t\tIgor has found all the required elements for his next birthday party!\n\t\t\tFrom now on he will get even more until that time comes.
\t\t\tWe can't imagin a good lunch without a nice aperitive.\n\t\t\tIgor knows now what he needs.
\t\t\tThe smells that come from Igor's lair don't leave a doubt about it: he has become\n\t\t\ta great lover of cheese. New dairy products will appear now in the caverns.
\t\t\tThis quest hasn't any practical use. It's only to suggest to you the great\n\t\t\tanime "Jungle wa itsumo Hare nochi Guu". Banyaaaaaïï ^__^
\t\t\tSweets are no longer a secret to Igor. Now he will be able to collect\n\t\t\tany of Good-looking Harry's legendary sweets that he finds in Hammerfest!
\t\t\tIgor has started to make mysterious gadgets... get ready to collect strange\n\t\t\tmachines in the game!
\t\t\tIgor has learnt to light himself up! Thanks to this torch he won't\n\t\t\tget lost any more in the darkness of the advanced levels!
\t\t\tReady for every danger, Igor won't ever be afraid of the darkness of\n\t\t\tthe advanced levels!
\t\t\tYou won 5 extra lives!!
\t\t\tYou won 10 free games!!
\t\t\tYou won 20 free games!!
\t\t\tFrom now on, each time you buy games with our payment service, you'll\n\t\t\tobtain more games for the same price!
\t\t\tYou squeezed the Sorbex lemons without mercy!
\t\t\tYou survived the Bombinos explosions!
\t\t\tYou killed a new monster: the Baddybombs Pears!
\t\t\tYou have only had a Tagada-Strawberry mouthful!
\t\t\tYou knew how to avoid all the traps from the Kiwi Sappers!
\t\t\tGreat, you haven't been impressed by the herd of Leapers!
\t\t\tYou have gloriously come to the end of the fight against the\n\t\t\tArmageddon-Pineapples!

\t\t\tYou finished the game! Your perseverance and tenacity permitted you to\n\t\t\tdefeat the evil Tuber and to recover Igor's nose. From now on you'll\n\t\t\thave an extra life and you'll play with the carrot!
\t\t\tIgor has discovered a mad passion for hats. From now on, disguise Igor by pressing\n\t\t\t"D" key.

\t\t\tIgor has accumulated enough wealth to finance his terrorist activities\n\t\t\tin Hammerfest. From now on, he will be able to disguise himself by pressing "D"\n\t\t\tkey during the game! By the way, have you already played www.dinoparc.com?
\t\t\tWe should have expected that: after collecting no matter what kind of item,\n\t\t\tIgor has finished by devouring a Pioupiou! Press "D" key during the game to change\n\t\t\tfancy dress.

\t\t\tLike his Italian counterpart (plumber in a red hat), Igor feels a\n\t\t\tgreat passion for mushrooms! You'll be able from now on to change Igor's\n\t\t\tdress during the game by pressing "D" key.

It seems like Igor has... changed. His look has become cool. He hides
			behind a great cloak and his face is dark. He's maybe changing little by
			little into the monster who was once his enemy.
			Disguise Igor as Tuber by pressing "D" key during the game!
\t\t\tIgor has found a Master Key. Undoubtedly, it will open a door somewhere in the\n\t\t\tcaverns...
\t\t\tYou have discovered an old Rusty Key in your adventure!\n\t\t\tIt has a small inscription: "Rick". Obviously, this was its previous owner.
\t\t\tThey say that the Meluzin, the legendary key of the ancient Hammerfest\n\t\t\ttales, opens the door to the greatest wealth. But where is the door?
\t\t\tThis strange little key smells of wine: it's the Wine Key!
\t\t\tLike any other snowman, Igor can't keep a key like this one in his hand.\n\t\t\tThe door that it opens gives access to the most hidden places of Hammerfest.
\t\t\tThis amorphous metallic thing does not seem to be worth a lot. Although,\n\t\t\twe should not trust appearances! Who knows what adventures hide beyond\n\t\t\tthe door it opens?
\t\t\tAll your administrative power will be backed up by the LovelyWood BJ22a\n\t\t\tAuthorization Form.
\t\t\tYou achieved level 50 in the Nightmare mode! You win the Arduous\n\t\t\tWorlds Key!
\t\t\tYou don't really know why, but the Itchy Key you've found, makes you\n\t\t\trun and roll everywhere!
\t\t\tTuber, the evil sorcerer, used to have a key...
\t\t\tAll your great power and skill in combat techniques gave you the\n\t\t\tchance to defeat Tuber in the Nightmare mode! You're now the privileged\n\t\t\towner of the Unique Key.

Alcohol abuse is bad for your health, according to the health
			authorities.
			However, in Hammerfest it has enabled you to unblock the Wine
			Key! From now on, you have a lot of chances of finding it in
			the caverns.
\t\t\tIgor is an expert in filling in administrative forms. You'll soon\n\t\t\tfind the LovelyWood BJ22a Authorization Form in the caverns.
\t\t\tThe best videogame player is you, there's no doubt about it! Your\n\t\t\tcontrol pads collection is enviable! From now on, Igor has a speed bonus\n\t\t\tat the beginning of each game.
\t\t\tThe Bancal Mirror you have found in the game shows you things from\n\t\t\tanother point of view. The extra option "Mirror" has been unblocked!
\t\t\tYou're talented. Very talented... but, are you able to help Igor\n\t\t\tin the Nightmare mode? This new option has been unblocked!
\t\t\tThe Carrotian Council has chosen you to explore the\n\t\t\tCaverns of Hammerfest in-depth. The Gordon's Key is only the first step of\n\t\t\ta new great mission...
\t\t\tYou have shown your great ability and dexterity in finding the Ankhel Jewel.\n\t\t\tThe Advanced Ball Control option has been unblocked in the Soccerfest mode game!
You’ve got all the necessary elements to bring Sandy the Sandman to life!\n This new character can join you in the Adventure Mode (Two players mode\n on the same computer).
You can now see things from a different angle with your friend. The game option "Mirror"\n has been added to the Two Players game mode.
It is evident that you are able to do great things together with a friend! The game option "Nightmare"\n has been added to the Two Players game mode.

Better late than never! Igor and Sandy have finally understood the importance of staying together
 in order to survive in the Caverns. The game option "Lives sharing" has been unblocked for
 the Two Players mode! With this option enabled, if a player loses his latest life, he will
 take a life from the second player and then he will be able to continue playing!
Jumping and jumping around has improved Igor's agility and now he's turning into a ninja!\n In order to prove his courage, he must collect all the ninja items hidden in Hammerfest!

Igor has completed his starting quest and now he's a grand master of Ninjutsu weapons!\n Nevertheless, his Code of Honour prevents him from using them. Although now he will be able\n to test his skills in the "Ninjutsu" game mode he has unblocked!
Igor is unbeatable when he needs to move fast. He now has to prove it to the others!\n The TIME ATTACK mode and its ranking have been unblocked. Be the fastest snowman in all Hammerfest!

You are a well-known expert in explosive material. To demonstrate this to everybody, you can\n now enable the "Unstable explosives" option in the Adventure mode. Pay attention to everything\n that explodes in the game! You can also push the bombs farther and move while you hit them.
You have discovered a bizarre pocket-size pyramid in Tuber's tomb.
